title: Enhancing AI Coding Assistants with Context Using RAG and SEM-RAG
author: Janakiram MSV
description: Boost developer productivity, efficiency and accuracy by incorporating retrieval-augmented generation and semantic memory into AI coding assistants.
cntitle: 使用 RAG 和 SEM-RAG 增强 AI 编码助手与上下文
cndescription: 通过将检索增强生成和语义记忆纳入 AI 编码助手，提升开发人员的生产力、效率和准确性。
